Code Documentation¶

sparkle.scripts.preprocess.concat_files(paths, file_name)[source]¶

Concatenates processed files from the paths into a single dataframe, and exports to csv

sparkle.scripts.preprocess.get_meta_info(df)[source]¶

Create metadata df with columns = [“watchOnTwistHand”, “n_pills”, “pills_low”]

sparkle.scripts.preprocess.pivot_data(df)[source]¶

Get ‘mean’, ‘min’, ‘max’, ‘std’ per window per column and pivot the entire data into a single row. Ex) Input df columns: [‘loggingSample’, ‘gyro_x’, ‘gyro_y’,.., ‘audio_average_power’, ‘window’] Output df columns: [‘gyro_x_mean_1’, ‘gyro_x_mean_2’,…,’audio_average_power_std_10’]

sparkle.scripts.preprocess.process_file(path)[source]¶

Preprocess a raw data into a single row data and add meta data columns.s

sparkle.scripts.preprocess.rename_columns(df)[source]¶

Rename columns. SensorLog’s data comes in two different types of column names depending on Apple Watch version.

sparkle.scripts.preprocess.trim_data(df, trim_start_pct, trim_end_pct)[source]¶

Trim first ‘trim_start_pct’ and last ‘trim_end_pct’ of data. Ex) trim_data(df, 0.05, 0.05)

sparkle.scripts.preprocess.window_data(df, n_windows)[source]¶

Partition data into equal sized windows and assign ‘window’ id. ‘window’ id ranges from 1 to n_windows.

class app.classes.User(username, email, password)[source]¶

Represents the “User” schema for SQLAlchemy. Hashes the password for security. Using __table_args__ due to recommendation here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/37908767/table-roles-users-is-already-defined-for-this-metadata-instance

check_password(password)[source]¶

Verify credentials of user by comparing password with encoded password hash

email¶
id¶
password_hash¶
set_password(password)[source]¶

Automatically hash password upon call of __init__()

username¶
app.classes.load_user(id)[source]¶

Reloads the user object from the session.

app.routes.adherence_model(data)[source]¶

takes in gyroscope data as a string and makes binary prediction about whether or not medication was consumed

app.routes.dashboard()[source]¶

The main dashboard for our site, only made visible to the user once logged in.

app.routes.index()[source]¶

Home page of our site. Many other pages redirect here.

app.routes.login()[source]¶

Page that allows registered users to log-in to our site.

app.routes.logout()[source]¶

Page that allows logged-in users to logout.

app.routes.register()[source]¶

Page that allows users to register an account on our site.

app.routes.send_data()[source]¶

Post route that receives and responds with json data. Currently set up to receive smart watch sensor data from Apple Watch.

app.routes.upload()[source]¶

Upload a file from the client machine.

tests.test_adherence_model()[source]¶

Test to ensure that the baseline pill prediction model behaves as expected.

tests.test_user_from_db()[source]¶

Test to ensure that a user’s info is correctly entered into database.

tests.user_from_db(username)[source]¶

Helper function to query a specific user from a database.
